isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - WINDSHIELD WASHER PUMP MOTOR

svcsubproc.title: Install Windshield Washer Pump Motor on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 93
for Items in parentheses.
The pump motor (Item 2) can be installed on the washer bottle (Item 1) without removing the washer bottle, the pump motor is serviceable and replaced as a unit.

step1.para: Position the pump motor (Item 2) at the washer bottle (Item 1), carefully push pump motor straight into the washer bottle.
Connect wiring harness connector (Item 3) to pump motor (Item 2).
Install windshield washer hose (Item 6) over pump motor outlet port (Item 7).
Fill washer bottle (Item 1) with windshield washer solvent and check for leaks and washer operation.
Tilt hood to fully closed position and latch hood on both sides.
